Áspero.definition:
Is a state of mind or feeling when you are [complaining] about [something] or simply [uncomfortable]/upset in some situation.
Also mentioned as: Ásperous
Áspero.example:
Guy1: "Oh god! This PC still dosent work!"
Guy2: "Hey! Are you Áspero?" or "Hey! Are you Ásperous?"

Guy1 is [sitting] in a chair in [complete] [silence] with a stange face.
Guy2 pass nearby and says: "Hey! Are you Áspero?" or "Hey! Are you Ásperous?"
